message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI 

This paper is about shot boundary detection in videos using spatio-temporal Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN). Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also involves the creation of a new dataset, which could fall under cs.MM (Multimedia). The use of CNNs for classification could also fall under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper involves optimization of processing speed, which could fall under cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
